content.en: Distributed algorithms: Researchers have been investigating various questions related to algorithms in distributed systems. These questions include analyzing quorum-based protocols for distributed exclusion, using a geometric approach to construct coteries and k-coteries, and exploring the properties of nondominated k-coteries. The agency attributed to algorithms in these studies is the solution, construction, analysis, refinement, and design of various algorithms for achieving mutual exclusion and efficient access to shared resources in distributed systems.
content.da: Distribuerede algoritmer: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige spørgsmål relateret til algoritmer i distribuerede systemer. Disse spørgsmål inkluderer at analysere kvorum-baserede protokoller for distribueret eksklusion, bruge en geometrisk tilgang til at konstruere kotier og k-kotier, samt udforske egenskaberne af ikke-dominerede k-kotier. Agenturen, der tilskrives algoritmer i disse undersøgelser, er løsningen, konstruktionen, analysen, forfiningen og designet af forskellige algoritmer til at opnå gensidig eksklusion og effektiv adgang til delte ressourcer i distribuerede systemer.
